lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon will carry the distinction of being the first man to prise a set off Novak Djokovic at this year's Australian Open but the lion-hearted Frenchman was crushed after going down in a five-set classic on Sunday.
snippet: Gilles Simon will carry the distinction of being the first man to prise a set off Novak Djokovic at this year's Australian Open but the lion-hearted Frenchman was crushed after going down in a five-set classic on Sunday....

headline.main: Simple Simon Plan Almost Did for Djokovic
headline.print_headline: Simple Simon Plan Almost Did for Djokovic
